name: Games (of Life) Done Quick!
description:
An optimized version of Conway's Game of Life, running on Pico-8 at 180 iterations per second!

Controls:
- left-click to place current object, or navigate menus.
- scroll wheel to select current object.
- right click to flip current object horizontally.
- middle click to flip current object vertically.
- arrow keys and x/c keys mapped to basic options, try them out!
